member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.CoordinateTransform
member.summary: Factory for creating coordinate transformers.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.CoordinateTransform.CreateManaged
member.summary: Create the dependency-free managed transformer (this library). Use this for standalone transforms without external native dependencies.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.CoordinateTransform.CreateManaged(GeoCrsTransform.ICrsCatalog)
member.summary: Create a transformer with a custom catalog (e.g. for testing or extended CRS set).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.CoordinateTransformer
member.summary: Transforms coordinates between CRSs using the catalog and WGS84 hub.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.CrsCatalog
member.summary: CRS catalog loaded from embedded major_crs.json.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.CrsDefinition
member.summary: Definition of a coordinate reference system.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.CrsKind
member.summary: Kind of CRS: geographic (lat/lon) or projected (eastings/northings).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.CrsId
member.summary: Identifier for a coordinate reference system (authority + code, e.g. EPSG:4326).

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.CrsId.TryParse(System.String,GeoCrsTransform.CrsId@)
member.summary: Parse a string like "EPSG:4326" into a CrsId.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.DatumTransform
member.summary: Helmert 7-parameter datum transform. Translations in meters, rotations in arc-seconds, scale in ppm. Apply in ECEF.

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.DatumTransform.Identity
member.summary: Identity transform (no change).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.Ellipsoid
member.summary: Reference ellipsoid (semi-major axis and inverse flattening).

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.Ellipsoid.SemiMajorAxisMeters
member.summary: Semi-major axis in meters.

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.Ellipsoid.InverseFlattening
member.summary: Inverse flattening (1/f).

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.Ellipsoid.SemiMinorAxisMeters
member.summary: Semi-minor axis (derived).

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.Ellipsoid.EccentricitySq
member.summary: First eccentricity squared (derived).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.GeoCoordinate
member.summary: Geographic coordinate (latitude, longitude, optional height).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.GeodeticEcef
member.summary: Geodetic (lat/lon/h) to ECEF and back using the given ellipsoid.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.GeodeticEcef.ToEcef(GeoCrsTransform.GeoCoordinate,GeoCrsTransform.Ellipsoid)
member.summary: Convert geographic coordinate to ECEF (meters).

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.GeodeticEcef.FromEcef(GeoCrsTransform.Vector3d,GeoCrsTransform.Ellipsoid)
member.summary: Convert ECEF (meters) to geographic. Handles poles and dateline.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.Helmert
member.summary: Apply Helmert 7-parameter transform in ECEF. Rotations stored in arc-seconds, converted to radians.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.Helmert.ApplyToWgs84(GeoCrsTransform.Vector3d,GeoCrsTransform.DatumTransform)
member.summary: Apply transform ToWgs84: source_datum -> WGS84 (ECEF). X_wgs = s*R*X_src + T.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.Helmert.ApplyFromWgs84(GeoCrsTransform.Vector3d,GeoCrsTransform.DatumTransform)
member.summary: Apply transform FromWgs84: WGS84 -> source_datum (ECEF). X_src = R'*(X_wgs - T)/s.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.Helmert.Apply(GeoCrsTransform.Vector3d,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Standard 7-parameter: X_wgs84 = (1+s) * R * X_src + T. R in arc-seconds (small angles).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.ICoordinateTransformer
member.summary: Transforms coordinates between CRSs.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.ICoordinateTransformer.Transform(GeoCrsTransform.GeoCoordinate,GeoCrsTransform.CrsId,GeoCrsTransform.CrsId,GeoCrsTransform.TransformOptions)
member.summary: Transform a geographic coordinate from source CRS to destination CRS. Result is GeoCoordinate or ProjectedCoordinate when dest is projected.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.ICoordinateTransformer.Transform(GeoCrsTransform.ProjectedCoordinate,GeoCrsTransform.CrsId,GeoCrsTransform.CrsId,GeoCrsTransform.TransformOptions)
member.summary: Transform a projected coordinate from source CRS to destination CRS. Result is geographic or projected depending on destCrs.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.ICrsCatalog
member.summary: Catalog of coordinate reference system definitions.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.ICrsCatalog.TryGet(GeoCrsTransform.CrsId,GeoCrsTransform.CrsDefinition@)
member.summary: Try to get a CRS definition by id.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.ICrsCatalog.TryGetByAlias(System.String,GeoCrsTransform.CrsId@)
member.summary: Try to resolve an alias (e.g. "WGS84", "UTM30N") to a CrsId.

member.name: M:GeoCrsTransform.ICrsCatalog.ListMajor
member.summary: List major CRS identifiers in the catalog.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.ProjectedCoordinate
member.summary: Projected coordinate (easting, northing in meters, optional height).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.ProjectionDefinition
member.summary: Definition of a map projection (parameters and base geographic CRS).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.ProjectionKind
member.summary: Supported projection types.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.ProjectionEngine
member.summary: Forward and inverse map projections.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.StubCrsCatalog
member.summary: Minimal in-memory catalog for testing; replaced by real catalog in Phase 3.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.TransformOptions
member.summary: Options for coordinate transformation.

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.TransformOptions.Strict
member.summary: If true, throw when CRS is unknown; if false, return error in result.

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.TransformOptions.AxisOrderPreference
member.summary: Axis order preference (library uses its default if not specified).

member.name: P:GeoCrsTransform.TransformOptions.AccuracyPreference
member.summary: Trade-off between speed and accuracy when multiple paths exist.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.AxisOrderPreference
member.summary: Preferred axis order for geographic coordinates.

member.name: F:GeoCrsTransform.AxisOrderPreference.LibraryDefault
member.summary: Use library default (typically lat, lon).

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.AccuracyPreference
member.summary: Preference when multiple transformation options exist.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.TransformResult`1
member.summary: Result of a coordinate transformation with metadata and warnings.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.AccuracyClass
member.summary: Indicates expected accuracy of the transform.

member.name: T:GeoCrsTransform.Vector3d
member.summary: 3D vector (e.g. ECEF in meters).
